alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 24 at 3:47AM MDT until May 24 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range/East Lake County Above 11000 Feet, Western Mosquito Range/East Chaffee County Above 9000 Feet and Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slushy and snow packed roads today.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
